Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armblockplacement-cpp/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armblockplacement-cpp">ARMBlockPlacement.cpp</a>.

### fixBackwardsWLS() {#ab273671903c0baabbbf098a0a4581101}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ARMBlockPlacement::fixBackwardsWLS (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineloop">MachineLoop</a> &#42; ML)</>}>
Checks if loop has a backwards branching WLS, and if possible, fixes it.

This requires checking the predecessor (ie. preheader or it&#39;s predecessor) for a WLS and if its loopExit/target is before it. If moving the predecessor won&#39;t convert a WLS (to the predecessor) from a forward to a backward branching WLS, then move the predecessor block to before the loopExit/target.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armblockplacement-cpp/#l00045">45</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armblockplacement-cpp">ARMBlockPlacement.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a36b58733e95f9deecf66046e2225981b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::ARMBlockPlacement::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.
